languages.text: {n}Внезапно проктор запрокидывает голову и смеется. Его хохот, необыкновенно искренний и заливистый, раскатывается по всему мостику.{/n} "Скажете тоже! Словно я позволю Глейто умереть, пока сам жив".
{n}Suddenly, Solomorne throws back his head and laughs. His laughter, unusually sincere and gleeful, rolls across the bridge.{/n} "Will you now? As if I'd let Glaito die while I still live!"
languages.original_text: {n}Внезапно проктор запрокидывает голову и смеется. Его хохот, необыкновенно искренний и заливистый, раскатывается по всему мостику.{/n} "Скажете тоже! Словно я позволю Глейто умереть, пока сам жив".

traits.locale_text: {n}Suddenly, Solomorne throws back his head and laughs. His laughter, unusually sincere and gleeful, rolls across the bridge.{/n} "Will you now? As if I'd let Glaito die while I still live!"
{n}Suddenly, Solomorne throws back his head and laughs. His laughter, unusually sincere and gleeful, rolls across the bridge.{/n} "Will you now? As if I'd let Glaito die while I still live!"

{n}Suddenly, Solomorne throws back his head and emits a sound whose very existence has long been doubted — the Proctor laughs. His laughter, unusually sincere and gleeful, rolls across the bridge.{/n} "Will you now? As if I'd let Glaito die while I still live!"

{n}Suddenly, Solomorne throws back his head and emits a sound whose very existence has long been doubted — the Proctor laughs. His laughter, unusually sincere and gleeful, rolls across the bridge.{/n} "Will you now? As if I'd let Glaito die while I still live!"

{n}Suddenly, Solomorne throws back his head and emits a sound whose very existence has long been doubted — the Proctor laughs. His laughter, unusually sincere and gleeful, rolls across the bridge.{/n} "Will you now? As if I'd let Glaito die while I still live!"
{n}Suddenly, Solomorne throws back his head and laughs. His laughter, unusually sincere and gleeful, rolls across the bridge.{/n} "Will you now? As if I'd let Glaito die while I still live!"
{n}Suddenly, Solomorne throws back his head and laughs. His laughter, unusually sincere and gleeful, rolls across the bridge.{/n} "Will you now? As if I'd let Glaito die while I still live!"

languages.text: {n}突然、ソロモーンは頭を反らせ、かつて誰も耳にしたことのなかった声を響かせた―代理人が笑ったのだ。珍しく心から楽しげな彼の笑い声は、ブリッジじゅうに響き渡った。{/n}「そう来ましたか。グライトを死なせておいて、私だけ生き延びるなんて、あるわけないでしょう！」
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, Solomorne throws back his head and emits a sound whose very existence has long been doubted — the Proctor laughs. His laughter, unusually sincere and gleeful, rolls across the bridge.{/n} "Will you now? As if I'd let Glaito die while I still live!"

traits.locale_text: {n}突然、ソロモーンは頭を反らせ、かつて誰も耳にしたことのなかった声を響かせた―代理人が笑ったのだ。珍しく心から楽しげな彼の笑い声は、ブリッジじゅうに響き渡った。{/n}「そう来ましたか。グライトを死なせておいて、私だけ生き延びるなんて、あるわけないでしょう！」

languages.text: {n}Plötzlich wirft Solomorne lachend den Kopf in den Nacken. Sein ungewöhnlich aufrichtiges und vergnügtes Lachen hallt über die Brücke.{/n} "Ach, tatsächlich? Als ließe ich Glaito sterben, während ich noch lebe!"
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, Solomorne throws back his head and laughs. His laughter, unusually sincere and gleeful, rolls across the bridge.{/n} "Will you now? As if I'd let Glaito die while I still live!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Plötzlich wirft Solomorne lachend den Kopf in den Nacken. Sein ungewöhnlich aufrichtiges und vergnügtes Lachen hallt über die Brücke.{/n} "Ach, tatsächlich? Als ließe ich Glaito sterben, während ich noch lebe!"

languages.text: {n}Solomorne bascule brusquement la tête en arrière et s'esclaffe. Son rire, étonnamment franc et joyeux, résonne à travers la passerelle.{/n} « Allons bon... Comme si j'étais capable d'abandonner Glaito à son sort ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, Solomorne throws back his head and laughs. His laughter, unusually sincere and gleeful, rolls across the bridge.{/n} "Will you now? As if I'd let Glaito die while I still live!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne bascule brusquement la tête en arrière et s'esclaffe. Son rire, étonnamment franc et joyeux, résonne à travers la passerelle.{/n} « Allons bon... Comme si j'étais capable d'abandonner Glaito à son sort ! »

languages.text: {n}De repente, Solomorne echa la cabeza hacia atrás y ríe. Su risa, inusualmente sincera y alegre, resuena por todo el puente.{/n} «¿No me diga? ¡Como si fuera yo a permitir que Glaito muriese antes que yo!».
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, Solomorne throws back his head and laughs. His laughter, unusually sincere and gleeful, rolls across the bridge.{/n} "Will you now? As if I'd let Glaito die while I still live!"

traits.locale_text: {n}De repente, Solomorne echa la cabeza hacia atrás y ríe. Su risa, inusualmente sincera y alegre, resuena por todo el puente.{/n} «¿No me diga? ¡Como si fuera yo a permitir que Glaito muriese antes que yo!».

languages.text: {n}突然间，索罗蒙向后仰过了头，发出了这么长时间以来你从未听过的声音。他放声大笑，笑声回荡在舰桥上，充满了真诚与欢欣。{/n}“真的假的？只要我还活着，格雷托就死不了！”
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, Solomorne throws back his head and laughs. His laughter, unusually sincere and gleeful, rolls across the bridge.{/n} "Will you now? As if I'd let Glaito die while I still live!"

traits.locale_text: {n}突然间，索罗蒙向后仰过了头，发出了这么长时间以来你从未听过的声音。他放声大笑，笑声回荡在舰桥上，充满了真诚与欢欣。{/n}“真的假的？只要我还活着，格雷托就死不了！”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, başını aniden geriye atıp kahkaha atıyor. Alışılmadık derecede samimi ve neşeli kahkahası, köprüye yayılıyor.{/n} "Gerçekten mi? Sanki ben hayattayken Glaito'nun ölmesine müsaade edeceğim de!"
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, Solomorne throws back his head and laughs. His laughter, unusually sincere and gleeful, rolls across the bridge.{/n} "Will you now? As if I'd let Glaito die while I still live!"
